owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uploadDocumentBatch(string,bytes32,strin.details: Mirrors single upload but accepts arrays for document fields.

verifyDocumentSet(string,bytes32[]).details: `merkleProof` must be [leaf, proof...] where leaf is      keccak256(abi.encodePacked(documentId, fileHash)) or another agreed      leaf construction used off-chain to build `rootHash`.

ROLE_REFINER().notice: Role bitmasks aligned to the access matrix.

memberRegistry().notice: MemberRegistry used to validate role-based access.

uploadDocument(string,string,string,stri.notice: Optional setId adds the document to an existing set.

uploadDocumentBatch(string,bytes32,strin.notice: Batch upload multiple documents and register them as a set.

verifyDocumentAndLog(string,string).notice: Optional logged verification for audit trails.

verifyDocumentSet(string,bytes32[]).notice: Verifies a leaf against the stored Merkle root for a set.
